author: K. Murdock

review: I like this as much as my Roku.
author: Jeff Fisher

review: I have always wanted to have a smart TV, but there are always issues with the pricing, proprietary tech, limited functionality, or bad interface... Although Chromecast is not perfect (it heats up a lot when I use it... something I don't really like), but for its price, it's really awesome!Best of all, I can make ANY TV a smart TV... Something of a benefit for me as I am still a bit nomadic with several overseas work placements. Highly recommended!
author: Aditia Nugraha

review: absolutely awesome device. Simple to setup and even easier to use. Recommended to all!!
author: Sidharath

review: Not very impressed! There is a lots of problems connecting this device and the type of apps that can be played on it i very limitted. You can't do mirror play and the quality of image is poor at best.
